name: Frogs (CodeGnat)
description:
Welcome to the Frog Swamp Map Update!

-The map is now larger

-The camera locations are optimized

-The frogs swim better

-More plants to enjoy

----------------------------------------------------------------

Right and left click to change view.

These frogs are special. They can jump around, sit still, croak, and even sleep. Amazing!

Hover over reeds to push them aside.

Thanks to leet_loves_space for the suggestions.
